Keywords: Acolytes , Brotherhood of Mutants , Hellfire Club
Real Name: Max Eisenhardt
Special Powers
RECRUITING SOLDIERS IN THE WAR FOR MUTANT SUPREMACY: At the beginning of the game, you may replace up to 5 friendly characters with the same number of characters from your Sideline on their starting clicks. All replacement and replaced characters must have the Brotherhood of Mutants, Acolytes, or Hellfire Club keyword(s) and different names. The total points of the replacement characters can't exceed the total points of the replaced characters.
MAGNETIC SHIELDING: Barrier, Energy Shield/Deflection. // Friendly characters with a shared keyword within range and line of fire can use Energy Shield/Deflection.

Shucks. "Don't you know who I am?!"
December 28, 2021

@tidge The Juggernaut idea is fun, but you have to swap in the same number of figs that you swap out.
December 21, 2021
tidge
The shared ESD is a great trick. A possibly greater one is Magneto swapping himself out for Tri-Sentinel or Dark Phoenix. For giggles at 300 points, I'd consider (after winning map choice) swapping out an entire 5- (or less) character force with the correct keywords for the 300 point animated Juggernaut. "You got this big guy."
July 24, 2021
Organous
If one was to boil down the basics of what Magneto would be in this game without being a powerhouse, you'd get: flight, shield, moving stuff around, and leading the "evil" mutants. This one checks all those boxes nicely.
July 24, 2021
Goop
Tk/Leadership/Barrier and gives everyone in LOF ESD for only 40pts. Just incredible, and you get to swap out figs based on what your facing. I like him a lot.
June 30, 2021
DarkTortoise23
You know I never thought I'd want a Magneto on my Avengers teams, but this guy just has so much potential for abuse when played with CAAV Steve Rogers. All your avengers or SHIELD agents get +2 against range attacks so long as he stays cooped up in the middle of your formation, and he can barrier as an extra layer of defense should things get spicy. He's good on the teams he's normally keyworded to, but I think he's an Avenger at heart.
